video.title: Continuum
video.synopsis: Kiera Cameron is a police officer in 2077 swept along when a gang of condemned terrorists escapes their sentences by traveling back in time to 2012.

episodes.synopsis: Officer Kiera Cameron and terrorist group Liber8 are transported back in time. Kiera quickly finds herself on a new mission, with a new identity.
episodes.title: A Stitch In Time

episodes.synopsis: When Kiera discovers Liber8's plan to return to 2077, she must decide whether or not to align herself with her sworn enemies.
episodes.title: Fast Times

episodes.synopsis: Kiera and Carlos investigate a series of mysterious murders in which victims have suffered a strange injury. Kellog delivers Kiera a gift.
episodes.title: Wasting Time

episodes.synopsis: A scientist working on a source of clean energy is found murdered. Kiera must decide between justice in the present or the preservation of her future.
episodes.title: Matter Of Time

episodes.synopsis: Liber8 becomes aware of a vulnerability: the possibility that if their ancestors, living in this time, are murdered, they might cease to exist.
episodes.title: A Waste Of Time

episodes.synopsis: When the CEO of a major corporation is kidnapped by Liber8, Kiera and Carlos have to beat the ticking clock in order to save her.
episodes.title: Time's Up

episodes.synopsis: Kiera struggles with trust and loyalty as evidence points to Carlos in the death of an investigative reporter.
episodes.title: The Politics Of Time

episodes.synopsis: When two murder-suicides happen in the same day, Kiera and Carlos investigate the only tie between the two: a video game company.
episodes.title: Game Time

episodes.synopsis: Alerted to a bulk purchase of fertilizer they believe may be used to build a bomb, Kiera and Carlos visit Roland's farm.
episodes.title: Family Time

episodes.synopsis: Kiera fights a ticking clock to stop a terrorist attack. Alec and Julian's place in history seems destined to be defined by a horrific event.
episodes.title: End Times

episodes.synopsis: Kiera resurfaces after an assassination. She tries to reconnect with Alec, who has changed since reading the message from his future self.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Kiera and Carlos's reunion is a bumpy one as they attempt to thwart Liber8's brazen rescue of Travis during a prison transfer.
episodes.title: Split Second

episodes.synopsis: Alec is injured in a car accident while joyriding with his friends, who are high on a dangerous new drug. Kiera recognizes the drug from her future.
episodes.title: Second Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: Kiera's pursuit of another time traveler leads her to her old partner, Elena -- but it also draws unwanted attention from Liber8.
episodes.title: Second Skin

episodes.synopsis: Sam's birthday sends Kiera into an emotional meltdown, which triggers an alert. Meanwhile, Kiera becomes the target of a department mole hunt.
episodes.title: Second Opinion

episodes.synopsis: Kiera must use her knowledge of the future to stop a serial killer while keeping a curious Carlos in the dark about her uncanny insights.
episodes.title: Second Truths

episodes.synopsis: Kiera and Carlos discover that a juror on Julian's trial has been compromised and must race to protect his family from a Liber8 plot.
episodes.title: Second Degree

episodes.synopsis: Kiera investigates the disappearance of several deceased time travelers' bodies, while Alec is taken hostage by Garza on orders from his future self.
episodes.title: Second Listen

episodes.synopsis: Alec's mother is shot; Dillon's new Liber8 task force is put to the test when Kiera must decide how far she will go to stop Julian's murderous future.
episodes.title: Seconds

episodes.synopsis: After an attack by the group posing as Section Six, Kiera is captured by Julian's followers. Alec reactivates Travis's military chip.
episodes.title: Second Wave

episodes.synopsis: After a series of cyber attacks, Kiera and Carlos race to find the perpetrator, while clues suggest Alec's own technology has something to do with it.
episodes.title: Second Guess

episodes.synopsis: Kiera and Carlos must stop Travis after he gets his hands on a second CPS suit, while Alec and Emily try to escape the mysterious Freelancers.
episodes.title: Second Last

episodes.synopsis: Kiera races to rescue Alec from himself and preserve her own chance of getting home. Alec must decide between solving Kiera's dilemma or his own.
episodes.title: Second Time

episodes.synopsis: A bullet follows Alec back in time and grazes his forehead. Meanwhile, Kiera isn't sure whether she can trust the Freelancers.
episodes.title: Minute by Minute

episodes.synopsis: Alec regrets his betrayal when he learns the repercussions of his actions. Kiera comes face to face with a lifeless Other Kiera.
episodes.title: Minute Man

episodes.synopsis: Kiera consults the Freelancers regarding Other Kiera's death. Lucas launches an elaborate escape from psychiatric prison.
episodes.title: Minute to Win It

episodes.synopsis: A shellshocked Carlos remains haunted by the death of Other Kiera. Other Alec assumes his father's role as head of PIRON.
episodes.title: A Minute Changes Everything

episodes.synopsis: Curtis Chen is determined to make Kiera an ally, but Kiera still doubts his motives. Other Alec takes drastic measures at PIRON.
episodes.title: 30 Minutes to Air

episodes.synopsis: A deadly attack puts future Kiera's health in jeopardy. Back in the present, Kiera must decide which Alec should remain in the timeline.
episodes.title: Wasted Minute

episodes.synopsis: A conflicted Kiera second-guesses her decision to help the Freelancers by exposing Curtis' betrayal.
episodes.title: Waning Minute

episodes.synopsis: While Alec grapples with his duties at PIRON, Kiera joins Dillon on an investigation and comes face to face with some disquieting facts.
episodes.title: So Do Our Minutes Hasten

episodes.synopsis: While Kiera and Carlos search for a band of high-tech criminals, a mysterious man who lost his memory searches for shreds of his identity.
episodes.title: Minute of Silence

episodes.synopsis: Red Kiera and John Doe grow closer, jeopardizing her relationship with the Freelancers; Green Alec uses dead Kiera's CMR chip to save Halo.
episodes.title: Revolutions Per Minute

episodes.synopsis: The identity of John Doe is revealed, throwing the plans of Liber8 into chaos. Red Alec's time travel device causes health problems for Jason.
episodes.title: 3 Minutes to Midnight

episodes.synopsis: After Curtis is revived, he seeks the true nature of "the Traveler," while Kiera pursues Alec, and Sonya's actions have explosive consequences.
episodes.title: The Dying Minutes

episodes.synopsis: Kiera's reluctant alliance with Liber8 continues as they try to stop Young Alec from unleashing the deadly technology that will destroy their future.
episodes.title: Last Minute
